body.p: A Workspace Access plugin extension can contribute custom actions to the contextual menus, main menu or to the general Oxygen toolbars.

li.p: This sample Workspace Access plugin contributes to the application a new toolbar called SampleWorkspaceAccessToolbarID. The java code of the sample plugin will use the toolbar components customizer API.
Contribute an action on the main menu.
As exemplified in the sample plugin the addMenuBarCustomizer API can be used either to add a new menu on the main menu toolbar or to customize the existing main menu.

The same sample plugin uses the addMenusAndToolbarsContributorCustomizer API to contribute a contextual menu customized. Such a customizer can be contributed either for the Text or for the Author editing mode.

body.p: Once the action is added, you can define a new shortcut key for it using the ActionProvider API. The action can use the WSEditor API to make changes to the opened XML documents: .
